descriptionNullable:
### Context

MyAnimeList 2021 Dataset is a dataset created from scraping JikanPy API for MyAnimeList anime data. The following data is going to be used for personal projects for Anime Recommendation and Analysis.

### Content

Data collection of JikanPy API takes roughly 12+ Hours of API Scraping with the division approach of the index to search. With a huge list of roughly 18.000+ anime listed to date, I analyzed the data deeply to gather insights and created a recommendation engine for future applications.

### Acknowledgements

This dataset wouldn't have been possible without the huge library of memes provided for content from [ImgFlip](https://www.ImgFlip.com) 

This dataset wouldn't have been possible without the huge library of animes provided for content from [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net) and [JikanPy Library](https://jikan.moe/)

### Inspiration

As an aspiring Data Scientist learning and analyzing anime data. I find it exciting to gather more insights into anime from data collected by MyAnimeList. To analyze the origin, genres, audience, and etc. takes the approach in the notebook I've created.
title: MyAnimeList 2021
subtitle: MyAnimeList Dataset Updated to 2021
description:
### Context

MyAnimeList 2021 Dataset is a dataset created from scraping JikanPy API for MyAnimeList anime data. The following data is going to be used for personal projects for Anime Recommendation and Analysis.

### Content

Data collection of JikanPy API takes roughly 12+ Hours of API Scraping with the division approach of the index to search. With a huge list of roughly 18.000+ anime listed to date, I analyzed the data deeply to gather insights and created a recommendation engine for future applications.

### Acknowledgements

This dataset wouldn't have been possible without the huge library of memes provided for content from [ImgFlip](https://www.ImgFlip.com) 

This dataset wouldn't have been possible without the huge library of animes provided for content from [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net) and [JikanPy Library](https://jikan.moe/)

### Inspiration

As an aspiring Data Scientist learning and analyzing anime data. I find it exciting to gather more insights into anime from data collected by MyAnimeList. To analyze the origin, genres, audience, and etc. takes the approach in the notebook I've created.
